body:
GUO.X,

The CHKBKS warning happens any time you have a concave zone, which includes zone shapes that beyond those that are explicitly L-shaped so you are right to change the solar distribution here.

I don't know why Openstudio is not generating a result file after this change.  If you upload a GH file with the minimum components needed to recreate the situation, we can check out what is going on.

-Chris
